member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION
member.summary: TheACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION structure is used by the function.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulEncodedAssemblyIdentityLength
member.summary: Length of the encoded assembly identity in bytes.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulManifestPathLength
member.summary: Length of the assembly manifest path in bytes.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.liManifestLastWriteTime
member.summary: The last time the manifest was written. This is in the form of aFILETIME data structure.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulPolicyPathLength
member.summary: Length of the publisher policy path in bytes.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.liPolicyLastWriteTime
member.summary: The last time the policy was written. This is in the form of aFILETIME data structure.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulManifestVersionMajor
member.summary: Major version of the assembly queried by. For more information, seeAssembly Versions.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulManifestVersionMinor
member.summary: Minor version of the assembly queried by. For more information, seeAssembly Versions.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulPolicyVersionMajor
member.summary: Major version of any policy, if one exists.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulPolicyVersionMinor
member.summary: Minor version of any policy, if one exists.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulAssemblyDirectoryNameLength
member.summary: Length of the assembly directory name in bytes.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.lpAssemblyEncodedAssemblyIdentity
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated string that contains a textually-encoded format of the assembly's identity.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.lpAssemblyManifestPath
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated string that indicates the original path to this assembly's manifest.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.lpAssemblyPolicyPath
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated string that indicates the path of whatever policy assembly was used to determine that this version of the assembly should be loaded. If this member is null, no policy was used to decide to load this version.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_ASSEMBLY_DETAILED_INFORMATION.lpAssemblyDirectoryName
member.summary: Pointer to a null-terminated string that indicates the folder from which this assembly was loaded.
